export class CustomButtonPlugin extends plugin {
    constructor() {
        super({
            name: 'æŒ‰é’®',
            dsc: 'å‘é€å¸¦æŒ‰é’®çš„æ¶ˆæ¯',
            event: 'message',
            priority: -100,
            rule: [
                {
                    reg: "^#å‘$",
                    fnc: 'sendButtonMessage'
                }
            ]
        });
    }

    async sendButtonMessage(e) {
        // åˆ›å»ºçº¯æ–‡æœ¬æ¶ˆæ¯
        const textMessage = "è¿™æ˜¯å¸¦æœ‰æŒ‰é’®çš„æ¶ˆæ¯";

        // å®šä¹‰æŒ‰é’®æ•°æ®
        const buttonData = {
            type: "keyboard",
            id: "102131063_1733621958", // æŒ‰é’®æ¨¡æ¿ID
        };

        try {
            // å‘é€çº¯æ–‡æœ¬æ¶ˆæ¯
            await e.reply(textMessage);

            // å‘é€æŒ‰é’®æ¶ˆæ¯
            await e.reply(segment.raw(buttonData));
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('å‘é€æŒ‰é’®æ¶ˆæ¯å‡ºé”™ï¼š', error);
            await e.reply("æŒ‰é’®æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•ã€‚");
        }
    }
}

export class ArkCardPlugin extends plugin {
    constructor() {
        super({
            name: "ARK å¡ç‰‡æ’ä»¶",
            dsc: "å‘é€ ARK å¡ç‰‡æ¶ˆæ¯",
            event: "message",
            priority: 50,
            rule: [{ reg: "^(#|/)?å¤§å›¾$", fnc: "sendArkCard" }]
        });
    }

    async sendArkCard(e) {
        const arkMessage = {
            type: "ark",
            template_id: 37,  // æ¨¡æ¿ ID
            kv: [
                {
                    "key": "#PROMPT#",
                    "value": "é€šçŸ¥æé†’"
                  },
                  {
                    "key": "#METATITLE#",
                    "value": "æ ‡é¢˜"
                  },
                  {
                    "key": "#METASUBTITLE#",
                    "value": "å­æ ‡é¢˜"
                  },
                  {
                    "key": "#METACOVER#",
                    "value": "https://php.yunzaibot.cn/i/2025/03/28/feyyo0.jpg"
                  },
                  {
                    "key": "#METAURL#",
                    "value": "https://php.yunzaibot.cn/i/2025/03/28/feyyo0.jpg"
                },                   
            ]
        };

        // å‘é€ ARK æ¶ˆæ¯
        await e.reply(arkMessage);
    }
}

export class ArkCardPlugin extends plugin {
